value:
[
{
"component": "header",
"variant": 2,
"value": "Scripting Language:-"
},
{
"component": "header",
"variant": 2,
"value": "What is Scripting Language?"
},
{
"component": "text",
"value": "yah ek aisi programming bhasha hai. Jiska prayog karke kisi dusre software application(e.g:- Firefox) par control kiya ja skta hai, aur script ke sahare us application se adhik kam liya ja skata hai.",
"decoration": {
"type": "number",
"value": 1
}
},
{
"component": "text",
"value": "example ke liye Firefox ek browser hai jo \"c/c++\" language me likha hua hai iske upar \"javascript\" me kuchh line ka program likhakar bade-bade kam kraye jate hai.",
"decoration": {
"type": "number",
"value": 2
}
},
{
"component": "text",
"value": "'Javascript,Python,Ruby,Perl,Php' yah kuchh main scripting languages hai.

",
"decoration": {
"type": "number",
"value": 3
}
},
{
"component": "header",
"variant": 2,
"value": "Advantage/Disadvantage of Scripting Language :-"
},
{
"component": "header",
"variant": 1,
"value": "Advantage"
},
{
"component": "text",
"value": "No complex build necessary.",
"decoration": {
"type": "number",
"value": 1
}
},
{
"component": "text",
"value": "Dynamic.changing code at runtime is completely normal.

",
"decoration": {
"type": "number",
"value": 2
}
},
{
"component": "header",
"variant": 1,
"value": "Disadvantage"
},
{
"component": "text",
"value": "It is requires the Scripting software to be installed on the server.",
"decoration": {
"type": "number",
"value": 1
}
},
{
"component": "text",
"value": "Many scripis and CMS tools required database in order to store dynamic data.

",
"decoration": {
"type": "number",
"value": 2
}
},
{
"component": "header",
"variant": 2,
"value": "Main feature of Scripting Language."
},
{
"component": "text",
"value": "Yeh often compile nahi kiya jati hai, balki interpret kiya jati hai.",
"decoration": {
"type": "number",
"value": 1
}
},
{
"component": "text",
"value": "Yeh language often shikhne me aasan hoti hai, aur utni hi aasani se ",
"decoration": {
"type": "number",
"value": 2
}
},
{
"component": "text",
"value": "pryog ki ja sakti hai.",
"decoration": {
"type": "number",
"value": 3
}
},
{
"component": "text",
"value": "Inme typing ke niyam sakth nahi hote hai.",
"decoration": {
"type": "number",
"value": 4
}
},
{
"component": "text",
"value": "Editing and running code is fast.

",
"decoration": {
"type": "number",
"value": 5
}
},
{
"component": "text",
"value": "Allow complex tasks to be performed in relatively few steps."
},
{
"component": "text",
"value": "

Umid krte hai ye videos aapko scripting language smjhne me madad kregi.

"
},
{

{

"value": "In ouestion ko krte hue aap internet ka use kr sakte hai aur Friends help le skte hai:-"
},
{

"value": "Questions :-"
},
{

"value": "Script language ko aur jaane k liye peer learning kre?",

},
{

"value": "What is scripting language?",
"decoration": {
